foreignData.name: Kinzu vom trostlosen Zirkel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn eine andere Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen und sie ins Exil schicken. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie jener Kreatur ist, außer dass er 1/1 ist und Toxisch 1 hat. (Spieler, denen von einer solchen Kreatur Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem eine Giftmarke.)

foreignData.name: Kinzu del Pacto Lóbrego
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que otra criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, puedes pagar 2 vidas y exiliarla. Si lo haces, crea una ficha que es una copia de esa criatura, excepto que es 1/1 y tiene la habilidad de tóxico 1. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de ella también obtienen un contador de veneno.)

foreignData.name: Kinzu de Mornecouvent
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie et l'exiler. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton qui est une copie de cette créature, excepté qu'il est 1/1 et qu'il a toxique 1. (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de ce jeton gagnent aussi un marqueur « poison ».)

foreignData.name: Kinzu della Tetra Congrega
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura non pedina che controlli muore, puoi pagare 2 punti vita ed esiliarla. Se lo fai, crea una pedina che è una copia di quella creatura, tranne che è 1/1 e ha tossico 1. (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da questa creatura ottengono anche un segnalino veleno.)

foreignData.name: 冷たき集いのキンズー
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでもこれでもないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、あなたは「２点のライフを支払い、それを追放する。」を選んでもよい。そうしたなら、１/１であり毒性１を持つことを除き、そのクリーチャーのコピーであるトークン１つを生成する。（それに戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター１個を得る。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・吸血鬼

foreignData.name: Kinzu do Conventículo Sombrio
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que uma criatura não ficha que você controla morre, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida e exilá-la. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha que seja uma cópia daquela criatura, exceto por ser 1/1 e ter tóxico 1. (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate dessa criatura também recebem um marcador de veneno.)

foreignData.name: 峻集的琴祖
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以支付2点生命并将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但它是1/1且具有下毒1。（受到其战斗伤害的牌手还会得到一个中毒指示物。）
foreignData.type: 传奇生物 ～非瑞人／吸血鬼

mainBoard.name: Kinzu of the Bleak Coven
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay 2 life and exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's 1/1 and has toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by it also get a poison counter.)

rulings.text: A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action and doesn't use the stack. In other words, it happens immediately and players can't respond to it, just like a player losing the game due to having 0 or less life.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any "as [this creature] enters the battlefield" or "[this creature] enters the battlefield with" abilities of the creature will also work.
Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.

Except for the listed exceptions, the token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature was tapped or untapped, whether it had any counters on it or Auras or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that had changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.
If something becomes a copy of the token, the copy also has base power and toughness 1/1 and has toxic 1.
If the copied creature had {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If the copied creature was copying something else, then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied, with the exceptions noted above.

If the token is a copy of a creature whose power and toughness are defined by an ability (usually printed as */* or similar), the token doesn't copy the ability that defines its power and toughness. It remains a 1/1 creature.

Multiple instances of toxic are cumulative. For example, if a creature has toxic 2 and gains toxic 1 due to another effect, combat damage that creature deals to a player will cause that player to get 3 poison counters.
The token copies the creature as it last existed on the battlefield before it died, not as it existed in the graveyard before it was exiled.

Toxic doesn't change the amount of combat damage a creature deals. For example, if a 2/2 creature with toxic 1 deals combat damage to a player, that creature will deal 2 damage. The results of that damage are the player loses 2 life and gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay 2 life and exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's 1/1 and has toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by it also get a poison counter.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Even the most insignificant creature can be perfected.

foreignData.flavorText: Selbst das unbedeutendste Geschöpf kann perfektioniert werden.
foreignData.name: Leichenfledderer-Skirg
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Verdorben — Solange ein Gegner drei oder mehr Giftmarken hat, hat der Leichenfledderer-Skirg Todesberührung und Lebensverknüpfung.

foreignData.flavorText: Hasta la criatura más insignificante puede perfeccionarse.
foreignData.name: Esquirge buscahuesos
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Corrupto — Mientras un oponente tenga tres o más contadores de veneno, el Esquirge buscahuesos tiene las habilidades de toque mortal y vínculo vital.

foreignData.flavorText: Même la créature la plus insignifiante peut être perfectionnée.
foreignData.name: Scrige glaneur d'os
foreignData.text:
Vol
Corrompu — Tant qu'un adversaire a au moins trois marqueurs « poison », le Scrige glaneur d'os a le contact mortel et le lien de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Persino la più insignificante delle creature può essere perfezionata.
foreignData.name: Skirge Spolpaossa
foreignData.text:
Volare
Corrotto — Fintanto che un avversario ha tre o più segnalini veleno, lo Skirge Spolpaossa ha tocco letale e legame vitale.

foreignData.flavorText: どんなに取るに足らない生物でも完成化は可能だ。
foreignData.name: 骨拾いのスカージ
foreignData.text:
飛行
堕落 ― 対戦相手１人が３個以上の毒カウンターを持っているかぎり、骨拾いのスカージは接死と絆魂を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・インプ

foreignData.flavorText: Até a criatura mais insignificante pode ser aperfeiçoada.
foreignData.name: Eskirge Pegaosso
foreignData.text:
Voar
Corrompido — Enquanto um oponente tiver três ou mais marcadores de veneno, Eskirge Pegaosso terá toque mortífero e vínculo com a vida.

foreignData.flavorText: 就连最不起眼的生物，也能臻至完美。
foreignData.name: 拣骨斯克魔
foreignData.text:
飞行
腐化～只要某对手具有三个或更多中毒指示物，拣骨斯克魔便具有死触与系命异能。

mainBoard.name: Bonepicker Skirge
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Corrupted — As long as an opponent has three or more poison counters, Bonepicker Skirge has deathtouch and lifelink.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
Corrupted — As long as an opponent has three or more poison counters, this creature has deathtouch and lifelink.

mainBoard.flavorText: From within its form, a single word echoed forth: "Devour."

foreignData.flavorText: Aus den Tiefen der Gestalt hallte ein einziges Wort wider: „Fresst."
foreignData.name: Stechender Schwarmherrscher
foreignData.text:
Toxisch 1 (Spieler, denen von dieser Kreatur Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem eine Giftmarke.)
Wenn der Stechende Schwarmherrscher stirbt, erzeuge einen 1/1 farblosen Phyrexianer-Milbe-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein mit Toxisch 1 und „Diese Kreatur kann nicht blocken."

foreignData.flavorText: Desde las profundidades de su carcasa, solo se repetía una palabra: "devorar".
foreignData.name: Líder de colmena aguijoneador
foreignData.text:
Tóxico 1. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de esta criatura también obtienen un contador de veneno.)
Cuando el Líder de colmena aguijoneador muera, crea una ficha de criatura artefacto Ácaro Pirexiano incolora 1/1 con la habilidad de tóxico 1 y "Esta criatura no puede bloquear".

foreignData.flavorText: Du plus profond de sa forme résonna un seul mot : « Dévorer ».
foreignData.name: Maître de l'essaim piquant
foreignData.text:
Toxique 1 (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de cette créature gagnent aussi un marqueur « poison ».)
Quand le Maître de l'essaim piquant meurt, créez un jeton de créature-artefact 1/1 incolore Phyrexian et Puce avec toxique 1 et « Cette créature ne peut pas bloquer ».

foreignData.flavorText: Dalle profondità della sua forma, echeggiava una sola parola: "divorare".
foreignData.name: Signore dell'Alveare Pungente
foreignData.text:
Tossico 1 (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da questa creatura ottengono anche un segnalino veleno.)
Quando il Signore dell'Alveare Pungente muore, crea una pedina creatura artefatto Acaro Phyrexiano 1/1 incolore con tossico 1 e "Questa creatura non può bloccare".

foreignData.flavorText: その姿より、一つの言葉が響き渡った。「貪りつくせ。」
foreignData.name: 有刺巣主
foreignData.text:
毒性１（このクリーチャーから戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター１個を得る。）
有刺巣主が死亡したとき、毒性１と「このクリーチャーではブロックできない。」を持つ無色の１/１のファイレクシアン・ダニ・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・邪術師

foreignData.flavorText: De dentro de sua forma ecoou uma única palavra: "Devorar".
foreignData.name: Mestre de Colmeia Aguilhoante
foreignData.text:
Tóxico 1 (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate desta criatura também recebem um marcador de veneno.)
Quando Mestre de Colmeia Aguilhoante morrer, crie uma ficha de criatura artefato Phyrexiano Ácaro incolor 1/1 com tóxico 1 e "Esta criatura não pode bloquear".

foreignData.flavorText: 从其体内，两个字音不断回响：「吞噬。」
foreignData.name: 螯刺御虫师
foreignData.text:
下毒1（受此生物战斗伤害的牌手还会得到一个中毒指示物。）
当螯刺御虫师死去时，派出一个1/1无色非瑞人／虫械衍生神器生物，且具有下毒1与「此生物不能进行阻挡。」

mainBoard.name: Stinging Hivemaster
mainBoard.originalText:
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)
When Stinging Hivemaster dies, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature token with toxic 1 and "This creature can't block."

Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.

mainBoard.text:
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)
When this creature dies, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature token with toxic 1 and "This token can't block."

mainBoard.flavorText: She proudly carries the weight of Phyrexia's creed, both figuratively and literally.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie trägt stolz das Gewicht von Phyrexias Heiliger Schrift, sowohl im wörtlichen als auch im übertragenen Sinne.
foreignData.name: Trägerin des Testaments
foreignData.text: Wenn die Trägerin des Testaments stirbt, schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: Carga orgullosa con el peso del credo de Pirexia, literal y metafóricamente.
foreignData.name: Portadora de testamentos
foreignData.text: Cuando la Portadora de testamentos muera, mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y el resto en tu cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle porte fièrement le fardeau du crédo de Phyrexia, à la fois littéralement et figurativement.
foreignData.name: Porteuse de testament
foreignData.text: Quand la Porteuse de testament meurt, regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'elles dans votre main et le reste dans votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Porta con orgoglio il fardello del credo di Phyrexia, sia in senso figurato che letterale.
foreignData.name: Portatrice del Testamento
foreignData.text: Quando la Portatrice del Testamento muore, guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女はファイレクシアの信条を誇らしげに背負っている。比喩的にも文字通りにも。
foreignData.name: 証を携える者
foreignData.text: 証を携える者が死亡したとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード３枚を見る。そのうちの１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: Ela carrega orgulhosamente o peso do credo de Phyrexia, tanto figurativa quanto literalmente.
foreignData.name: Porta-testamento
foreignData.text: Quando Porta-testamento morrer, olhe os três cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um deles em sua mão e o restante em seu cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: 她光荣承担非瑞克西亚信条之重～无论精神上或肉体上皆是如此。
foreignData.name: 负约徒
foreignData.text: 当负约徒死去时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。

mainBoard.name: Testament Bearer
mainBoard.originalText: When Testament Bearer dies, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
mainBoard.text: When this creature dies, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Give all you are to Phyrexia, and you will receive more than you could have ever desired."

foreignData.flavorText: „Gib dich ganz Phyrexia hin, und du wirst reicher belohnt, als du es dir je erträumen könntest."
foreignData.name: Angebot der Unsterblichkeit
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Todesberührung und Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören sie nicht.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Ofrece todo tu ser a Pirexia y recibirás más de lo que puedas desear".
foreignData.name: Ofrecer la inmortalidad
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo gana las habilidades de toque mortal e indestructible hasta el final del turno. (El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruir" no la destruyen.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Donne tout ton être à Phyrexia, et tu recevras bien plus que tout ce que tu n'aurais jamais pu désirer. »
foreignData.name: Offrir l'immortalité
foreignData.text: Une créature ciblée acquiert le contact mortel et l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne la détruisent pas.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Tutto ciò che sei offrilo a Phyrexia e riceverai più di quanto avresti mai potuto desiderare."
foreignData.name: Offrire l'Immortalità
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio ha tocco letale e indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non la distruggono.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「あなたの全てをファイレクシアに捧げなさい。そうすれば、あなたが望んだ以上のものを受け取ることができるでしょう。」
foreignData.name: 不死性の提供
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは接死と破壊不能を得る。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、それは破壊されない。）

foreignData.flavorText: "Concedam a Phyrexia tudo o que são e vocês receberão mais do que jamais desejaram."
foreignData.name: Oferecer a Imortalidade
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo ganha toque mortífero e indestrutível até o final do turno. (O dano e os efeitos que dizem "destrua" não a destroem.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「将你的一切都献予非瑞克西亚，所得回报将远超所想。」
foreignData.name: 恩赐不朽
foreignData.text: 目标生物获得死触与不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

mainBoard.name: Offer Immortality
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
mainBoard.text: Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "I give you pain, you give me information. A simple trade, is it not?"

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich gebe dir Schmerzen, und du gibst mir Informationen. Ein fairer Handel, findest du nicht?"
foreignData.name: Infektiöse Untersuchung
foreignData.text: Du ziehst zwei Karten und verlierst 2 Lebenspunkte. Jeder Gegner erhält eine Giftmarke.

foreignData.flavorText: "Yo te doy dolor y tú me das información. ¿No te parece un intercambio sencillo?".
foreignData.name: Consulta infecciosa
foreignData.text: Robas dos cartas y pierdes 2 vidas. Cada oponente obtiene un contador de veneno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je te fais souffrir, et en échange tu me donnes des informations. Simple comme marché, non ? »
foreignData.name: Enquête infectieuse
foreignData.text: Vous piochez deux cartes et vous perdez 2 points de vie. Chaque adversaire gagne un marqueur « poison ».

foreignData.flavorText: "Io ti do dolore, tu mi dai informazioni. È uno scambio piuttosto semplice, non credi?"
foreignData.name: Indagine Infettiva
foreignData.text: Peschi due carte e perdi 2 punti vita. Ogni avversario ottiene un segnalino veleno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「私は苦痛を与える。君は情報を与える。単純な取引だろう、ちがうか？」
foreignData.name: 伝染性尋問
foreignData.text: あなたはカード２枚を引き、２点のライフを失う。各対戦相手はそれぞれ毒カウンター１個を得る。

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu te dou dor, você me dá informação. Uma transação simples, não?"
foreignData.name: Inquérito Infeccioso
foreignData.text: Você compra dois cards e perde 2 pontos de vida. Cada oponente recebe um marcador de veneno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我给你痛苦，你予我信息。很简单的交易，不是吗？」
foreignData.name: 播疫探究
foreignData.text: 你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。每位对手各得到一个中毒指示物。

mainBoard.name: Infectious Inquiry
mainBoard.originalText: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Each opponent gets a poison counter.
mainBoard.text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Each opponent gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.flavorText: The dull, creeping pain of phyresis curdled in Vraska's blood. She knew as soon as it took her, she would betray everything—even Jace.

foreignData.flavorText: Der dumpfe, schleichende Schmerz der Phyrese ließ Vraskas Blut stocken. Als sie von ihr Besitz ergriff, wusste sie, dass sie alles verraten würde — auch Jace.
foreignData.name: Vraskas Fall
foreignData.text: Jeder Gegner opfert eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker und erhält eine Giftmarke.

foreignData.flavorText: El dolor lento y profundo de la piresis se cuajaba en la sangre de Vraska. En cuanto la invadió, supo que lo traicionaría todo, incluso a Jace.
foreignData.name: Caída de Vraska
foreignData.text: Cada oponente sacrifica una criatura o planeswalker y obtiene un contador de veneno.

foreignData.flavorText: La sourde douleur rampante de la phyrésie glaça le sang de Vraska. Elle sut alors qu'elle trahirait tout, même Jace.
foreignData.name: Chute de Vraska
foreignData.text: Chaque adversaire sacrifie une créature ou un planeswalker et gagne un marqueur « poison ».

foreignData.flavorText: Vraska avvertì il dolore sordo e strisciante della phyresis coagularsi nel sangue. Sapeva che, non appena avesse ceduto, avrebbe tradito tutto... persino Jace.
foreignData.name: Caduta di Vraska
foreignData.text: Ogni avversario sacrifica una creatura o un planeswalker e ottiene un segnalino veleno.

foreignData.flavorText: 忍び寄るファイレクシア病の鈍い痛みが、ヴラスカの血の中で凝り固まった。それに我が身が侵されてしまえば、全てを裏切ることになるだろうと彼女は知っていた。たとえジェイスでさえも。
foreignData.name: ヴラスカの堕落
foreignData.text: 各対戦相手はそれぞれクリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１体を生け贄に捧げ、毒カウンター１個を得る。

foreignData.flavorText: A dor entorpecente e insidiosa da phyresis coagulava o sangue de Vraska. Ela soube, assim que ela a tomou, que trairia tudo, até mesmo Jace.
foreignData.name: Queda de Vraska
foreignData.text: Cada oponente sacrifica uma criatura ou um planeswalker e recebe um marcador de veneno.

foreignData.flavorText: 非瑞化的针刺隐痛逐渐在瓦丝卡的血液凝结。她从自己染疾的那一刻起，就知道自己会背叛一切～甚至是杰斯。
foreignData.name: 瓦丝卡沦落
foreignData.text: 每位对手各牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客并得到一个中毒指示物。

mainBoard.name: Vraska's Fall
mainBoard.originalText: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker and gets a poison counter.

rulings.text: Each opponent gets a poison counter even if they can't sacrifice any permanents.

mainBoard.text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker of their choice and gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Watch your footing around here. Anything you might step on probably has teeth."

mainBoard.name: Bilious Skulldweller
mainBoard.originalText:
Deathtouch
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

rulings.text: A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action and doesn't use the stack. In other words, it happens immediately and players can't respond to it, just like a player losing the game due to having 0 or less life.
Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.

Multiple instances of toxic are cumulative. For example, if a creature has toxic 2 and gains toxic 1 due to another effect, combat damage that creature deals to a player will cause that player to get 3 poison counters.

Toxic doesn't change the amount of combat damage a creature deals. For example, if a 2/2 creature with toxic 1 deals combat damage to a player, that creature will deal 2 damage. The results of that damage are the player loses 2 life and gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.text:
Deathtouch
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

mainBoard.flavorText: What cannot be remade will be unmade, one scrap at a time.

foreignData.flavorText: Was nicht wiederhergestellt werden kann, wird vernichtet — Fetzen für Fetzen.
foreignData.name: Krabbelnder Fiepser
foreignData.text: Verdorben — Opfere ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur: Ziehe eine Karte. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls ein Gegner drei oder mehr Giftmarken hat, und nur einmal pro Zug.

foreignData.flavorText: Lo que no se pueda rehacer se deshará, pedazo a pedazo.
foreignData.name: Alimaña chillona
foreignData.text: Corrupto — Sacrificar un artefacto o criatura: Roba una carta. Activa esto solo si un oponente tiene tres o más contadores de veneno y solo una vez por turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Ce qui ne peut être refait sera défait, pièce par pièce.
foreignData.name: Faufilin bruyant
foreignData.text: Corrompu — Sacrifiez un artefact ou une créature : Piochez une carte. N'activez que si un adversaire a au moins trois marqueurs « poison » et qu'une seule fois par tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Ciò che non può essere rifatto verrà disfatto, un pezzetto alla volta.
foreignData.name: Rosicchiatore Squittente
foreignData.text: Corrotto — Sacrifica un artefatto o una creatura: Pesca una carta. Attiva solo se un avversario ha tre o più segnalini veleno e solo una volta per turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 作り直せないものは作られず、その都度屑鉄ができあがる。
foreignData.name: 騒がしい這い回り
foreignData.text: 堕落 ― アーティファクトやクリーチャーのうち１つを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。対戦相手１人が３個以上の毒カウンターを持っているときに各ターン１回のみ起動できる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・ネズミ

foreignData.flavorText: O que não pode ser refeito será desfeito, peça por peça.
foreignData.name: Rasteirinho Chiador
foreignData.text: Corrompido — Sacrifique um artefato ou uma criatura: Compre um card. Ative somente se um oponente tiver três ou mais marcadores de veneno e uma única vez a cada turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 不能修好重用的就将之弃置，一次销毁一小块。
foreignData.name: 吱响掠行兽
foreignData.text: 腐化～牺牲一个神器或生物：抓一张牌。只能于某对手具有三个或更多中毒指示物时起动，且每回合限一次。

mainBoard.name: Chittering Skitterling
mainBoard.originalText: Corrupted — Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent has three or more poison counters and only once each turn.
mainBoard.text: Corrupted — Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent has three or more poison counters and only once each turn.

foreignData.name: Nim-Erwecker-Paladin
foreignData.text:
Toxisch 2 (Spieler, denen von dieser Kreatur Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem zwei Giftmarken.)
Wenn der Nim-Erwecker-Paladin ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl mit Manabetrag 3 oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignData.name: Paladín alzanims
foreignData.text:
Tóxico 2. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de esta criatura también obtienen dos contadores de veneno.)
Cuando el Paladín alzanims entre al campo de batalla, regresa la carta de criatura objetivo con valor de maná de 3 o menos de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignData.name: Paladin nimancien
foreignData.text:
Toxique 2 (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de cette créature gagnent aussi deux marqueurs « poison ».)
Quand le Paladin nimancien arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez dans votre main une carte de créature ciblée avec une valeur de mana inférieure ou égale à 3 depuis votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Paladino Evocanim
foreignData.text:
Tossico 2 (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da questa creatura ottengono anche due segnalini veleno.)
Quando il Paladino Evocanim entra nel campo di battaglia, riprendi in mano dal tuo cimitero una carta creatura bersaglio con valore di mana pari o inferiore a 3.

foreignData.name: 屍賊起こしの聖騎士
foreignData.text:
毒性２（このクリーチャーから戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター２個を得る。）
屍賊起こしの聖騎士が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にありマナ総量が３以下であるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・騎士

foreignData.name: Paladino Criador de Nim
foreignData.text:
Tóxico 2 (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate desta criatura também recebem dois marcadores de veneno).
Quando Paladino Criador de Nim entrar no campo de batalha, devolva o card de criatura alvo com valor de mana igual ou inferior a 3 de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignData.name: 召泞神圣武士
foreignData.text:
下毒2（受此生物战斗伤害的牌手还会得到两个中毒指示物。）
当召泞神圣武士进战场时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你坟墓场移回你手上。

mainBoard.name: Nimraiser Paladin
mainBoard.originalText:
Toxic 2 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get two poison counters.)
When Nimraiser Paladin enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

foreignData.name: Nekrogen-Kommunion
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst
Die verzauberte Kreatur hat Toxisch 2. (Spieler, denen von ihr Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem zwei Giftmarken.)
Wenn die verzauberte Kreatur stirbt, bringe sie unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.name: Comunión necrógena
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura que controlas.
La criatura encantada tiene la habilidad de tóxico 2. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de ella también obtienen dos contadores de veneno.)
Cuando la criatura encantada muera, regresa esa carta al campo de batalla bajo tu control.

foreignData.name: Communion nécrogène
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : une créature que vous contrôlez
La créature enchantée a toxique 2. (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de cette créature gagnent aussi deux marqueurs « poison ».)
Quand la créature enchantée meurt, renvoyez cette carte sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle.

foreignData.name: Comunione Necrogena
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura che controlli
La creatura incantata ha tossico 2. (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da essa ottengono anche due segnalini veleno.)
Quando la creatura incantata muore, rimetti quella carta sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo.

foreignData.name: 屍気の拝領
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー）
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは毒性２を持つ。（そのクリーチャーから戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター２個を得る。）

foreignData.name: Comunhão Necrogênica
foreignData.text:

A criatura encantada tem tóxico 2. (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate dessa criatura também recebem dois marcadores de veneno.)
Quando a criatura encantada morrer, devolva aquele card ao campo de batalha sob seu controle.
